We wear a lot of hats at Carvana. My role involves anything from managing our ATS (Greenhouse) to playing hostess at meetup events to recruiting and hiring the best Microsoft Developers. No day is the same, and we like to keep it that way.Carvana brings auto shopping online in a compelling way, with financing and direct-to-your-door delivery. Ranked #5 on Forbes'‚Äã 2015 "America's Most Promising Companies"‚Äã list, Carvana is the very first complete online car buying experience. We're headquartered in Phoenix with hubs all over the country. Have your car delivered to your door or pick it up from our state-of-the-art car vending machine. Work at Carvana. I do!

Infusionsoft started as a small business and more than 50% of the employees have owned or worked at a small business. The love for small businesses is at the core of the culture.As a contract talent sourcer, I got creative to find top talent to join the Infusionsoft team. My projects focused primarily on marketing and technical professionals for digital marketing and software development positions.

recommendations: Human Resources and Recruitment Business Partner
September 17, 2013, Laura worked with Claire in the same group

Laura and I worked together at Christie's Education for several months before she was promoted to another position within Christie's. We sat next to each other and as a result, she spent much of her valuable time training me and patiently answering my questions. She knew a great deal about each role in our office and always made it her goal to be knowledgeable and informed. Laura's organization also set her apart as an Administrator. She set up an excellent organizational framework for me that I still follow. She is an asset to any company as she is always willing to help colleagues succeed.

summary: The not-so-fascinating truth:I'm an Art History major who accidentally discovered an obsession with cool tech stuff. From that point on, I knew I belonged with data-driven companies who recognize that predictive analytics is the future of HR and Talent Acquisition.  My major interests are Spock (don't tell my Star Wars-oriented family), NY-style pizza and baking. At Carvana, I focus on Technical Recruitment, which seems to be the closest I can get to The Matrix. Still waiting for Morpheus to offer me the red or blue pills; it would be a tough decision considering how much fun we have on Carvana's IT & Engineering teams. In addition to recruitment, I act as Carvana's ATS Admin (Greenhouse) and assist with vendor management.My goals for the next few years are:- to help Carvana reach its full potential as a car buying experience that doesn't suck- to assist in making our HR and Recruitment software as efficient and streamlined as possible- to finally master my interview poker face- to build the smartest, most curious team of IT, analytics and engineering professionals this side of the Mississippi. You know what I mean?
name: Claire Priddy
title: Technical Recruitment & Greenhouse Admin at Carvana
